Programming Trello

Programming Trello

In the programming board, we both keep track of tasks and also plan meetings. Check the board frequently to make sure you know what has been assigned to you. If you need help on a task, add the Requires Assistance tag.

Up for grabs

All tasks in this list have not been claimed or assigned to a team member. Need something to work on? Grab one of these!

Ideas

These are project ideas, offseason plans, and other things to think about or try out.
